name: generic-cypress-test
description: Test automation for drupal core functionalities

scripts.run:test:dev: cross-env CYPRESS_username=<username> CYPRESS_password=<password> cypress open --env configFile=dev
scripts.run:live:baseline: cross-env PERCY_BRANCH=live_site CYPRESS_username=<username> CYPRESS_password=<password> npx percy exec -- cypress run --env configFile=prod,TAGS='@visual_existing'
scripts.run:dev:vs:live: cross-env PERCY_BRANCH=dev PERCY_TARGET_BRANCH=live_site CYPRESS_username=<username> CYPRESS_password=<password>  npx percy exec -- cypress run --env configFile=dev,TAGS='@visual_existing'
scripts.run:uat:vs:live: cross-env PERCY_BRANCH=uat PERCY_TARGET_BRANCH=live_site CYPRESS_username=<username> CYPRESS_password=<password>  npx percy exec -- cypress run --env configFile=uat,TAGS='@visual_existing'
scripts.run:dev:vs:uat: cross-env PERCY_BRANCH=dev PERCY_TARGET_BRANCH=uat CYPRESS_username=<username> CYPRESS_password=<password>  npx percy exec -- cypress run --env configFile=dev,TAGS='@visual_existing'
scripts.run:pr:branch:vs:uat/dev/live: cross-env PERCY_TARGET_BRANCH=<uat/dev/live_site> CYPRESS_username=<username> CYPRESS_password=<password>  npx percy exec -- cypress run --env configFile=<Your local accessable file>,TAGS='@visual_existing'
scripts.run:dev:vs:figma: cross-env PERCY_BRANCH=dev_vs_figma PERCY_TARGET_BRANCH=figma_design CYPRESS_username=<username> CYPRESS_password=<password> npx percy exec -- cypress run --env configFile=dev,TAGS='@visual_redesign'

author: prasanna
